chapter.title: Creating a Key Pair
chapter.para: Key pairs are used to provide SSH access to Nova compute instances. These steps will show you how to create them with either the Horizon dashboard UI or the command-line tools.
For more details about access and security for Nova, see Configure access and security for instances.

section.title: Creating a Key Pair using Horizon

listitem.para: Log in to your Horizon dashboard.
Under the Project menu, navigate to Access and Security.
Navigate to the Key Pairs tab and select the Create Key Pair button.
Enter in a unique name for your key pair and then select the Create Key Pair button.

Your key pair will be created and the public key portion of the key (.pem) will be automatically downloaded to your local computer. You will then have the option to select this key pair when creating new Nova compute instances.
